dedicate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to give all your attention and effort to one particular thing
dedicate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The actress now dedicates herself to children’s charity work.
dedicate.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to say at the beginning of a book or film, or before a piece of music, that it has been written, made, or performed for someone that you love or respect
dedicate.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The book was dedicated to her husband.
dedicate.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to state in an official ceremony that a building will be given someone’s name in order to show respect for them
dedicate.translation[0].definitions[3].d: to use a place, time, money etc only for a particular purpose
dedicate.translation[0].definitions[3].e: The company dedicated $50,000 for the study.
